sentence.Network_en: She wondered where they were going to rendezvous afterwards.
sentence.Network_cn: 她想知道之后他们要去哪里约会。

sentence.Network_en: I had almost decided to keep my rendezvous with Tony.
sentence.Network_cn: 我差不多已经决定如约和托尼见面了。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from French rendez-vous! 'present yourselves!', imperative of se rendre

entry.def: A rendezvous is a meeting, often a secret one, that you have arranged with someone for a particular time and place.

example.ex: I had almost decided to keep my rendezvous with Tony.
example.tran: 我差不多已经决定如约和托尼见面了。

entry.def: A rendezvous is the place where you have arranged to meet someone, often secretly.

example.ex: Their rendezvous would be the Penta Hotel at Heathrow Airport.
example.tran: 他们将在希思罗机场的五角饭店碰面。

entry.def: If you rendezvous with someone or if the two of you rendezvous, you meet them at a time and place that you have arranged.

example.ex: The plan was to rendezvous with him on Sunday afternoon...
example.tran: 计划在周日下午和他会面。

example.ex: She wondered where they were going to rendezvous afterwards.
example.tran: 她想知道之后他们要去哪里约会。

means.word_mean: 1. a meeting planned at a certain time and place

sentences.sentence: "he was waiting for them at the rendezvous"

means.word_mean: 3. a date; usually with a member of the opposite sex

auth_sentence.content: The prohibition gave a certain piquancy to our clandestine rendezvous.
auth_sentence.res_content: The prohibition gave a certain piquancy to our clandestine rendezvous.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The prohibition gave a certain piquancy to our clandestine rendezvous.

auth_sentence.content: The cellar of our house was turned into a rendezvous for revolutionaries.
auth_sentence.res_content: The cellar of our house was turned into a rendezvous for revolutionaries.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The cellar of our house was turned into a rendezvous for revolutionaries.

auth_sentence.content: Air New Zealand ensures a stylish visit when you book their 5-night stay at the four-star Rendezvous Hotel Auckland.
auth_sentence.res_content: Air New Zealand ensures a stylish visit when you book their 5-night stay at the four-star Rendezvous Hotel Auckland.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Air New Zealand ensures a stylish visit when you book their 5-night stay at the four-star Rendezvous Hotel Auckland.

sentences.en: I have a rendezvous with Peter at a restaurant on the harbour.
sentences.cn: 我和彼得在海港的一个餐馆有个约会。

sentences.en: Although it was late, there was still enough time to keep the rendezvous.
sentences.cn: 虽然很晚了，但还有足够的时间去赴这个约会。

sentences.en: She made the rendezvous with only minutes to spare.
sentences.cn: 她还差几分钟时才来赴约。

sentences.en: The cafe is a popular rendezvous for young lovers.
sentences.cn: 这个咖啡馆是年轻恋人的约会圣地。

sentences.en: The platoon made its way to the pre-arranged rendezvous in the desert.
sentences.cn: 这个排向事先约定的沙漠中的会合点进发。

means.word_mean: （快餐店、酒吧等）公共场所，聚会处

sentences.cn: 巴黎一个热闹的公共场所
